name: Federation of European Rigid Polyurethane Foam Associations
goal:
PU Europe represents the polyurethane (PUR/PIR) insulation industry in Europe. It:
1 Develops one-voice positions on technical, safety, health and environment, standardisation and communication topics
2 Funds and coordinates studies and research programmes
3 Acts as information hub for its members and the wider public
interests: Business and Industry, Climate Action, Energy, Environment, Public Health, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: Circular Economy, Construction Products Regulation, Ecodesign Directive, Ecolabelling framework, Energy Efficiency Directive, Energy Performance of Buildings Directive, Energy Union, European Waste Policy, F Gas Regulation, REACH, Sustainable building
